tmpl:
{{#if ${bannerLists}}}
{{#each ${bannerLists}}}
{{#eq type 1}}
{{#eq @index 0}} {{{nLazyImage imgUrl title 'false'}}} {{^}} {{{nLazyImage imgUrl title 'true'}}} {{/eq}}
{{/eq}} {{#eq type 2}}
{{{nLazyImage video.coverImgUrl title 'false'}}}
{{{lazyVideo video.url ../${settings}.videoMouted false}}}
{{/eq}}
{{#if ${settings}.showText}}
{{#if title}}

{{title}}

{{/if}} {{#if summary}}

{{summary}}

{{/if}} MORE +
{{/if}}
{{/each}}
{{#if ${settings}.pagination}}
{{/if}} {{#if ${settings}.navigation}}
{{/if}}
{{#each ${bannerLists}}} {{#eq type 1}}

{{title}}

{{subTitle}}

{{/eq}} {{#eq type 2}}

{{title}}

{{subTitle}}

{{/eq}} {{/each}}
{{^}} {{{nNoDataPrompt ${i18n.noData}}}} {{/if}}

bannerLists.title: 住宅地产业务
bannerLists.subTitle: Commercial real estate
bannerLists.summary: 同时农场周边拥有完整的配套设施，结合百联购物中心的购物、娱乐、住宿、停车为一体，给游客提供了吃、喝、玩、乐一站式的综合园区。
